text: Kamen Rider Wizard is a Japanese tokusatsu drama in Toei Company's Kamen Rider franchise. ==Schedule== Super Hero Time aired alongside Tokumei Sentai Go- Busters and then Zyuden Sentai Kyoryuger. ==Cast== * Haruto Soma / Kamen Rider Wizard: Shunya Shiraishi * Koyomi / Wiseman: Makoto Okunaka * Shunpei Nara / Kamen Rider Mage: Junki Tozuka * Rinko Daimon / Kamen Rider Mage: Yuko Takayama * Kosuke Nito / Kamen Rider Beast: Tasuku Nagase * Shigeru Wajima: Hisahiro Ogura * Misa (Medusa), Mayu Inamori / Kamen Rider Mage: Erina Nakayama * Yugo (Phoenix): Atsushi * Sora (Gremlin): Takahisa Maeyama * Manager of donut shop: Kaba-chan * Worker of donut shop: Ryo Tayano * Chief of police: Takayasu Komiya * Masanori Kizaki: Naoki Kawano * Sou Fueki / Wiseman: Narushi Ikeda * Yuzuru Iijima / Kamen Rider Mage: Shinta Soma * Masahiro Yamamoto / Kamen Rider Mage: Shingo Kawaguchi * White Wizard (Voice): Toshitsugu Takashina * Wiseman (Voice): Toshio Furukawa * WizarDragon (Voice): Ryūzaburō Ōtomo * Beast Chimera (Voice): Tomomichi Nishimura * Narration: Hiroaki Hirata ===Guest cast=== * Caitsith (4, 5): Bernard Ackah * Manami Kawasaki (6, 7): Wanaka Matsumoto * Koichi Yamagata (6, 7): Ryosuke Takahashi * Tetsuya Iganaki (12, 13): Takuya Ishida * Naito (30, 31): Mitsu Murata * Kazuya Shinozaki (38, 39): Tatsuya Kishida * Aya Yamamoto (47, 48, 51): Miyuu Sawai * Tsukasa Kadoya (52, 53): Masahiro Inoue * Kota Kazubara (52, 53): Gaku Sano * Kamen Rider Den-O Sword Form (Voice; 52, 53): Toshihiko Seki ===In Magic Land cast=== * Captain of the Imperial Guard / Kamen Rider Mage: Ryuji Sainei * Shiina / Kamen Rider Mage: Tsubasa Takizawa * Minister Auma / Kamen Rider Sorcerer: Takanori Jinnai ==Theme songs== ; Opening theme * "Life is SHOW TIME" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: tatsuo (of everset) ** Artist: Shō Kiryūjin from Golden Bomber ; Insert themes * "Last Engage" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Ryo (of despiral) ** Artist: Kamen Rider Girls ** Episodes: 4, 10 * "Mystic Liquid" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Ryo (of despiral) ** Artist: Kamen Rider Girls ** Episodes: 3, 4, 15 * "Blessed wind" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition: Yoshio Nomura ** Arrangement: Rider Chips ** Artist: Rider Chips ** Episodes: 5, 13 * "Strength of the Earth" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition: Yoshio Nomura ** Arrangement: Rider Chips ** Artist: Rider Chips ** Episodes: 6, 7, 10, 17 * "Just The Beginning" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: AYANO (of FULL AHEAD) ** Artist: Kamen Rider Girls ** Episodes: 9, 12 * "BEASTBITE" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition: Yoshio Nomura ** Arrangement: Rider Chips ** Artist: Rider Chips ** Episodes: 17–19, 34 * "alteration" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Shuhei Naruse ** Artist: Kamen Rider Girls ** Episodes: 26 * "Missing piece" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi ** Composition & Arrangement: Ryo (of despiral) ** Artist: Kamen Rider Girls ** Episodes: 31, 32, 37, 39, 45 Category:Japanese science fiction television series Category:2012 Japanese television series debuts Category:2013 television series endings Category:2013 disestablishments in Asia
title: Kamen Rider Wizard
